document_data.name: ''Elfgate''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Elfgates''''' were enchanted portals that connected [[Evermeet]] with [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Powers: Most ''elfgates'' only offered one-way transportation from Evermeet to Faerûn, but a few could be used to move both ways. The [[elves]] strictly guarded the location, as well as the method of use, of all ''elfgates''.
document_data.History: An ''elfgate'' was used by the [[assassin]] who slew King [[Zaor Moonflower]]. Another ''elfgate'' was destroyed within [[Synnoria]] on the [[Moonshae Isles]] by a rampaging beast.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Khelben Arunsun]] guarded one end of an ''elfgate'' located in [[Blackstaff Tower]] in [[Waterdeep]].
